basic.description:
Fundamentals of Data Structures and Algorithms: arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, deques, asymptotic notation, hash and scatter tables, recursion, trees and
search trees, heaps and priority queues, sorting, and graphs. Advanced programming in the C language. Introduction to object oriented programming concepts in the context of data structures.
basic.subject: ELEC
basic.title: Fundamentals Of Information Structures

extra.enrollment_requirement: EXCLUSION:  CISC235.  A prerequisite of APSC 142 and registration in a BSCE Academic Program is required.
